name: ImmunizationMyCore
title: Immunization (MY Core)
description:
This profile represents the constraints applied to the Immunization resource by MY Core FHIR Implementation Guide. A record of an immunization is represented in the patient summary as an instance of an Immunization resource constrained by this profile.

It describes the event of a patient being administered a vaccination or a record of a vaccination as reported by a patient, a clinician or another party.
purpose: This profile constrains the representation of a record of a vaccination of the patient, in the context of the international patient summary as specified by the MY Core project.

element.short: Extension to determine if the vaccine is a booster dose
element.definition: Extension to determine if the vaccine is a booster dose
